title: Wi-Fi Rabbit
summary: Wi-Fi Rabbit is a widget that shows WiFi state by using icon.
description: Wi-Fi Rabbit is a widget that shows WiFi state by using icon.It can also show Wi-Fi access point information, toggling Wi-Fi ON/OFF, and switch access point.Widget style can be selected from "rabbit" or "cat".It support wearable devices like smartWatch3.Please check it out "Bluetooth Bear", "Volume Dog", and "3G Monkey".Wi-Fi Rabbithttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ficklerobot.wifirabiBluetooth Bearhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ficklerobot.bluetoothbear3G Monkey (  for Android2.3 or later )https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ficklerobot.threegmonkey
descriptionHTML:
Wi-Fi Rabbit is a widget that shows WiFi state by using icon.

It can also show Wi-Fi access point information, toggling Wi-Fi ON/OFF, and switch access point.

Widget style can be selected from "rabbit" or "cat".

It support wearable devices like smartWatch3.

Please check it out "Bluetooth Bear", "Volume Dog", and "3G Monkey".

Wi-Fi Rabbit
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ficklerobot.wifirabi
Bluetooth Bear
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ficklerobot.bluetoothbear
3G Monkey ( for Android2.3 or later )
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ficklerobot.threegmonkey
comments: Nice app, love the quirky graphics...but it would be great if it distinguished between an open network and one you had logged into with a successful connection! 5 stars when that happens.
HTC awesome app that works well with a mega bonus.... it's incredibly adorable! fun choosing a character and then customizing it's colour!
Comm I'm trying my best and I do what I can with with this my first time plus it seem like I agents the wall
Simple yet works very well! Thank you for your good work!
Love it! Does exactly what I wanted.
